alert.note: Alert for Callaway; Cole; Moniteau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 7:36PM CDT until August 02 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cole County in central Missouri... Southwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... Southeastern Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Centertown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Wardsville, St. Martins, Taos, Russellville, Centertown, St. Thomas, Brazito, McGirk, Marion, Lohman, Wainwright, Elston, Schubert, Osage City, and Osage Bend. This also includes Clarks Hill/Norton Historic Site and Jefferson Landing Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
